General.Name: Hefei Meiya Optoelectronic Technology Inc
General.Description: Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of intelligent sorting and inspection technology and products in China and internationally. The company offers AI sorter, X-ray inspection equipment and high-end CBCT. Its products include rice, tea, wheat and corn, grain, nuts, cashew, peanuts, beans, and plastic color sorters, as well as belt and chute sorters. It also provides X-ray inspection machines for canned food, dehydrated vegetable, frozen food, meat, mushroom, seafood, shoes/clothes/bags, snacks, and tire inspection. In addition, the company offers double layer, pre-sale, help desk, onsite, warranty, spare parts, and training services. It primarily serves agricultural products processing, industrial inspection, and health care markets in approximately 100 countries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Hefei, China.
General.Address: No. 668, Wangjiang West Road, Hefei, China, 230088
